value.title: Instagram tests using AI, other tools for age verification
value.excerpt: By BARBARA ORTUTAY and MATT O’BRIEN AP Technology Writers Instagram is testing new ways to verify the age of people using its service, including a face-scanning artificial intelligence tool, having mutual friends verify their age or uploading an ID.

value.title: The forgotten margins of AI ethics - a paper on AI ethics with teeth
value.excerpt: The field of AI ethics seems to generate more happy talk than potent ideas. It's rare to find an academic paper with real world teeth, but "The forgotten margins of AI ethics" stands out. Here's my critical review.
